message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's my final offer. I'm not willing to go any higher.
